alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Randolph (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 1:22PM CST until January 12 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Randolph County in east central Alabama... Eastern Cleburne County in east central Alabama... * Until 200 PM CST. * At 122 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Muscadine to 6 miles northeast of Corinth to near Lake Wedowee, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Heflin, Wedowee, Lake Wedowee, Ranburne, Fruithurst, Edwardsville, Woodland, Muscadine, Morrison Cross Roads, Abernathy, Fosters Cross Roads, Corinth, Mars Hills, Graham, Hollis Crossroads, Newell, Ofelia, Napoleon, Trickem and Lake Cleburne. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
